name: Check Mode
Date
Start Loop
func:
var d = msg.payload;
var arr = [];
var column = ['EPO', 'SHIP_NAME', 'BARGE', 'DEPARTURE', 'ARRIVAL', 'CURRENTT', 'NEXTT', 'TD', 'ETA', 'LASTRECORDDATE', 'LASTRECEIVEDATE', 'LATITUDE', 'LONGITUDE', 'FROMM', 'DESTINATION', 'STATUS', 'ANGLE', 'ROB', 'ROBONSTART', 'ESTROB', 'FUELCONS', 'ST', 'RPMENGINE_S', 'RPMENGINE_P', 'RPMAVR', 'RPMPROPELLER_S', 'RPMPROPELLER_P', 'WINDSPEED', 'SPEED', 'TARGET_FO'];
for(i=0;i<d.length;i++){
    var json = {};
    json[column[0]] = parseInt(String(d[i][column[0]]));//EPO
    json[column[1]] = d[i][column[1]]; //SHIPNAME
    json[column[2]] = d[i][column[2]]; //BARGE
    json[column[3]] = d[i][column[3]]; //DEPARTURE
    json[column[4]] = d[i][column[4]]; //ARRIVAL
    json[column[5]] = d[i][column[5]]; //CURRENT
    json[column[6]] = d[i][column[6]]; //NEXTT 
    json[column[7]] = d[i][column[7]]; //TD 
    json[column[8]] = d[i][column[8]]; //ETA
    json[column[9]] = d[i][column[9]]; //LASTRECORDDATE
    json[column[10]] = d[i][column[10]]; //LASTRECEIVEDATE
    json[column[11]] = parseFloat(String(d[i][column[11]])); //LATITUDE
    json[column[12]] = parseFloat(String(d[i][column[12]])); //LONGITUDE
    json[column[13]] = d[i][column[13]]; //FROMM
    json[column[14]] = d[i][column[14]]; //DESTINATION
    json[column[15]] = parseFloat(String(d[i][column[15]])); //STATUS
    json[column[16]] = parseFloat(String(d[i][column[16]])); //ANGLE
    json[column[17]] = parseFloat(String(d[i][column[17]])); //ROB
    json[column[18]] = d[i][column[18]]; //ROBONSTART
    json[column[19]] = d[i][column[19]]; //ESTROB
    json[column[20]] = d[i][column[20]]; //FUELCONS
    json[column[21]] = d[i][column[21]]; //ST
    json[column[22]] = parseFloat(String(d[i][column[22]])); //RPMENGINE_S
    json[column[23]] = parseFloat(String(d[i][column[23]])); //RPMENGINE_P
    json[column[24]] = parseFloat(String(d[i][column[24]])); //RPMAVR
    json[column[25]] = parseFloat(String(d[i][column[25]])); //RPMPROPELLER_S
    json[column[26]] = parseFloat(String(d[i][column[26]])); //RPMPROPELLER_P
    json[column[27]] = parseFloat(String(d[i][column[27]])); //WINDSPEED
    json[column[28]] = d[i][column[28]]; //SPEED
    json[column[29]] = parseFloat(String(d[i][column[29]])); //TARGET_FO
    arr.push(json);
}
msg.payload=  arr;
return msg;

name: Convert
func:
var data = msg.payload;
var data1 = {
    "time" : data.time*1000,
    "lat": data.Latitude,
    "lon": data.Longitude,
    "incTemperature": data.incTemperature,
    "IncX": data.IncX,
    "IncY": data.IncY,
    "IncZ": data.IncZ,
    "terminalTime": data.terminalTime,
    "serverEpochTime": data.serverEpochTime,
    "serverTime": data.serverTime,
    "Wind_Direction": data.Wind_Direction,
    "ws": data.Wind_Speed,
    "DT_Port": data.DT_Port,
    "DT_Stbd": data.DT_Stbd,
    "ST2_Center_Front": data.ST2_Center_Front,
    "ST2_Center_Back": data.ST2_Center_Back,
    "ST2_Port": data.ST2_Port,
    "ST2_Stbd": data.ST2_Stbd,
    "Speed_Kmph": data.Speed_Kmph,
    "Heading": data.Heading,
    "RPM_ENG_Port": data.RPM_ENG_Port,
    "RPM_ENG_Stbd": data.RPM_ENG_Stbd,
    "RPM_ENG_Port_Raw": data.RPM_ENG_Port_Raw,
    "RPM_ENG_Stbd_Raw": data.RPM_ENG_Stbd_Raw,
    "Speed_Knot": data.Speed_Knot
};

msg.payload = data1;
msg.countt = msg.topic;

return msg;
